kv4.8:1.1_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:4.5_0: Hañci bhagavā sayambhū, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.8:5.1_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:5.3_0: Bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle tīṇeva sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhānīti?
kv4.8:6.1_0: Nanu bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle cattāri sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhānīti?
kv4.8:6.3_0: Hañci bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle cattāri sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhāni, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.8:7.1_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:8.1_0: Bodhisatto aparantapaṁ akāsi, aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisīti?
kv4.8:9.1_0: Āyasmā ānando bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo,
kv4.8:9.3_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo,
kv4.8:10.1_0: Citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo,
kv4.8:10.1_1: citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:10.3_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo,
kv4.8:11.1_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo,
kv4.8:11.3_0: Āyasmā ānando bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:12.1_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo,
kv4.8:12.3_0: Citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:13.1_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo,
kv4.8:15.1_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:20.1_0: “Yathā kho tvaṁ, āvuso, paṭijānāsi, arahasi anantajino”ti?
kv4.8:23.1_0: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:23.4_1: pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
kv4.8:23.5_0: ‘Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
kv4.8:23.6_1: pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe… āloko udapādi.
kv4.8:23.8_0: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
kv4.8:23.11_0: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
kv4.8:23.14_0: ‘taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
kv4.8:23.15_1: pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.
